jobs.name: FRONT-END SOFTWARE ENGINEER
accomplishments: Developed a cross-platform app to provide an analytics dashboard and internal project management features primarily for our clients to manage their building utility usage.
Wrote specs and facilitated UX discussions for several features and projects including a help website that integrated with a custom-built CMS and tutorials on all platforms.
First-hire under management, providing onboarding and documentation for many new-hires.

jobs.name: FULL-STACK SOFTWARE ENGINEER
accomplishments: Worked across the stack with a small dev team on tight deadlines, following Agile methods to build a frontend with Angular and a backend REST API with ASP.NET, designing relational schemas, and integrating government-run medical databases.
Led UX revamp to improve registration and reduce data entry across workflow, which resulted in a 28-percent signup increase for our prescriptions savings tool.

jobs.name: FULL-STACK SOFTWARE ENGINEER
accomplishments: Built a custom ember-runtime based JavaScript framework which we used to implement small single page applications that provided insurance and health-assesement to our clients’ employees.
